Based on transactions posted within a CALENDAR month. If you are trying for Mar  probably wonâ€™t get because they are still pending.
Pending transactions do not count. If right now the spend tracker for your UOB One account on the app still haven't hit $500  you'll only get the 0.05% base interest end Apr.

Let me guess from my experience. You done your transactions on 25-Mar Mon. It will be 27 or 28th Mar before it is verified from pending on UOB one credit card account. Then it will be another 1-2 days for it to syn to UOB one saving account interest tracker. The problem is credit card transactions need to be verified unlike debit card transactions
